info.name: Pioneer DDJ-SB3
info.author: Dancephy.com
info.description: Mapping file for the Pioneer DDJ-SB3 controller. Version 1.1.0.

control.description: Toggles Play/Pause Deck 1, Button: left PLAY (Deck 1 active)
